checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.subtitle: Complete your purchase
checkout.medicalPackage: Medical Package - If you have an injury or chronic condition
checkout.couponMaxUsage: You have already used this coupon the maximum number of times allowed per user
checkout.couponGlobalLimit: This coupon has reached its global usage limit and can no longer be used
checkout.tabbyRejectionGeneral: Sorry, Tabby is unable to approve this purchase. Please use an alternative payment method for your order.
checkout.tabbyRejectionAmountHigh: This purchase is above your current spending limit with Tabby, try a smaller cart or use another payment method
checkout.tabbyRejectionAmountLow: The purchase amount is below the minimum amount required to use Tabby, try adding more items or use another payment method
checkout.tabbyCancellation: You aborted the payment. Please retry or choose another payment method.
checkout.tabbyFailure: Sorry, Tabby is unable to approve this purchase. Please use an alternative payment method for your order
checkout.uploadInstructions: Upload a clear screenshot of your payment transfer. Max file size: 5MB. Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF
checkout.orderSubmittedMessage: Your {{type}} order has been submitted and is pending approval.
checkout.nextSteps2: Our team will review and approve your order
checkout.nextSteps3: You'll be notified once your {{type}} is processed
checkout.nextSteps4: Your {{type}} will be processed and delivered according to the approval date
checkout.nextSteps3Subscription: You'll be notified once your subscription is activated
checkout.nextSteps4Subscription: Your subscription period will start from the approval date
checkout.nextSteps3Product: You'll be notified once your order is confirmed
checkout.nextSteps4Product: Your products will be shipped according to the processing timeline
checkout.nextSteps3Cart: You'll be notified once your order is confirmed
checkout.nextSteps4Cart: Your products will be shipped according to the processing timeline
